title: News 1
excerpt: Our group has secured a significant grant to further develop AI applications in advanced robotics...

title: News 2
excerpt: A new center focused on sustainable technologies has been inaugurated, fostering collaboration across departments.

title: News 3
excerpt: Our talented student team secured first place in the national collegiate robotics competition with their innovative designs.

title: News 4
excerpt: Our latest paper on next-generation ion thrusters has been published in the Journal of Spacecraft.

title: News 5
excerpt: Dr. Aris Thorne delivered a keynote address at the International Aerospace Symposium on future challenges.

title: News 6
excerpt: ORBI-Sat-1, our first student-built CubeSat, was successfully deployed into low Earth orbit this morning.

title: News 7
excerpt: A new strategic partnership with Axiom Industries will accelerate our research in deep space communication.

title: News 8
excerpt: PhD candidate Lena Petrova wins the Best Dissertation Award for her work on orbital mechanics.

title: News 9
excerpt: The new Advanced Propulsion and Power Laboratory was inaugurated today by the institute director.

title: News 10
excerpt: ORBI hosted a successful 48-hour hackathon on using satellite data for climate change monitoring.

title: News 11
excerpt: Our research on heat-shielding nanomaterials has been accepted for publication in 'Advanced Materials'.

title: News 12
excerpt: We were honored to host a guest lecture from Dr. R. Chen, a lead engineer from NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory.

title: News 13
excerpt: Our students presented their latest prototypes at the annual Institute of Technology Showcase.

title: News 14
excerpt: ORBI alumnus Dr. Kenji Tanaka is featured in 'SpaceTech Monthly' for his work on commercial spaceflight.

title: News 15
excerpt: Registration is now open for our upcoming international workshop on autonomous rover navigation.

title: News 16
excerpt: Version 2.0 of our open-source orbital simulation software has been released to the public.

title: News 17
excerpt: Our team conducted a STEM outreach program for local high school students, inspiring the next generation.

title: News 18
excerpt: Congratulations to Dr. Emily Carter on her promotion to Associate Professor in Aerospace Engineering.

title: News 19
excerpt: A new patent has been filed for our innovative satellite battery management system.

title: News 20
excerpt: In honor of Earth Day, our remote sensing team released new data on regional deforestation trends.

title: News 21
excerpt: Several of our researchers presented their findings at the IEEE Aerospace Conference this past week.

title: News 22
excerpt: A new high-performance computing cluster is now online, enabling more complex simulations.

title: News 23
excerpt: ORBI is collaborating with the European Space Agency (ESA) on a new orbital debris tracking project.

title: News 24
excerpt: Graduate student David Chen has been awarded the prestigious Zenith Aerospace Scholarship.

title: News 25
excerpt: Our new AI model for predicting solar flare activity has completed its initial training phase.

title: News 26
excerpt: The robotics laboratory has received a major upgrade with new 3D printing and manufacturing capabilities.

title: News 27
excerpt: Our work in sustainable rocket fuels was featured in the latest issue of 'Future Tech Magazine'.

title: News 28
excerpt: We are pleased to welcome Dr. Isabella Rossi from the Italian Space Agency as a visiting scholar.

title: News 29
excerpt: The first dataset from the ORBI-Sat-1 mission has been made publicly available to the research community.

title: News 30
excerpt: Announcing the 1st Annual ORBI Research Symposium, call for papers is now open.
